title: Discovering democracy: stories of democracy (PC & MAC)
brief_description: A comprehensive tour using print, audio, video and graphic sources through the history and basic features of democracy as a system in Australia and internationally. This CD-rom provides specifically designed pathways of directed information and interactive learning about people, events and policies in relation to the history and current manifestations of democracy. Suitable for middle and upper primary students, as well as lower and middle secondary levels. It also contains constant explanation of terms used and citations of the sources drawn from - for independent research.
